detail.desc: Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.
Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.
According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.
"What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"
Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.
We are small, but we are legion.
These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."
"…I love my job."
"The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance
"I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel like… I'm home." —Ana Bray
"Cryptarchs made a crystal that starts fires? Get me one. I don't care how you do it. Go!" —Cayde-6
The latest Omolon engineering leverages liquid fuel as coolant to keep weapon systems at biting subzero temperatures.
"I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning
Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.
Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.
Charge your soul and let the electrons sing.
The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"
"Can't outrun the sunrise." —Liu Feng
A single strike can alter the course of history.
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.
We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.
Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?
Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.
"In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn
Entropy is inevitable.
"Some things should stay buried."
Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.
Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.
We strive to know infinity, and sharpen our minds on the whetstone of the impossible.
"Doesn't matter how good you are—you stay out there too long, you're not coming back. Not the same way you left, anyway." —Tevis
Starlight is your guide. No vacuum will contain you.
"I see you."
You can see the point, right? Who wants to team up with one?
Plating the Ahamkara bones in silver helps to quiet the auditory hallucinations… o bearer mine.
"No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes
"We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons
"This won't end well for one of us. And darling, it won't be me." —Self-styled "Lady" Olu Alderdice
Give me your arm, oh bearer mine. Let me help you fill the world with teeth.
Listen carefully when the serpent speaks, for its tongue is forked, and its words have two meanings.
"It is my honor." —Chalco Yong to Ikora Rey
> No one has ever died wearing me. # It's true. She leaves the unworthy before they fall.
Interfaces with synapses (or nearest equivalent) to draw electric power directly from the wearer's body.
"Hey, if it works for computers…" —Marcus Ren
"I love making people laugh. And by 'people,' I mean me. Haha!" "Haha! Me!"
"What? No, I didn't illegally mod the holster. These are just really lucky pants!" —Cayde-6
Never, ever, look back.
"I call them the Stompies! For when your legs need that extra kick." —Marcus Ren
Absolute, unflinching resolve.
"He walked out into the demon light. But at the end he was brighter." —Paean to Saint-14
BRAINVAULT Sigma-ACTIUM-IX Cranial Dreadnought (Invincible Type)
"Have you ever stared into the green soulfire flame? There is terror, but also… something warm." —Eris Morn
"It is your turn. These people will follow you to the very end. Remember that we were forged in Light." —Aodh, Second Empyreal Magistrate of the Sunbreaker
"We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons
The Active Contact Defense system uses warsat hull materials to store a retaliatory charge.
Nobody calls it that.
Caution: the organism has been known to develop consciousness. In these cases, immediate termination is recommended.
For this, there is one remedy.
Conflict Resolution Solution #3479: Leave them to rest wherever they may fall.
"You who seek the Forge: your journey will be long, but your destination is closer than you think." —Ouros
Pardon me. Coming through.
Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace.
All expect that you should rouse yourself, as did the former lions of your blood.
Designed for the seamless delivery of justice in an unjust world.
"The Hive do not see how we see. They look beyond, into the infinite. Into the dark." —Eris Morn
Only bones for your feast. Only death for my victory.
Mighty are they of the stormcloud thrones, and quick to anger, but bounteous to those whom they love.
"He is that which is an end. And he shall rise again." —passage from Of Hated Nezarec, a pre-Golden Age text.
When the universe conspires, its enemies cannot hide.
Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?
The mind is malleable, filled with transient and fleeting ideas. Let us shape it, so that you may see the infinite splendor of the universe.
"Have I the aspic in my lips?"
"We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons
"I know you." —Lord Felwinter
"When one can wield the fire of stars, what use is flesh and bone?"
"You are mine, you shall be mine, you and I are one for ever."
There is power in blood.
"Drawn like so, the Rift circle reinscribes planetary energy as a destructive force." —Ikora Rey, "On Circles, Volume 12"
13.4 billion years ago, the first stars kindled out of darkness, seeding the future of all life.
There will come a day when the light will never fade.
Your relationship with consistent spacetime is...tenuous at best.
"I thank you for the gift of these atoms. I will use them well." —The Stoic
The conspirators were too afraid to kill me—rightly so. I am the beloved father of the people, and the glorious mob would not suffer my death. My sentence was exile.

The Ghost Primus was strong because of his disfigurement, not in spite of it. He alone had the vision to share my dream of a new, perfect world. Ghaul was a creature of singular beauty, and I loved him.
Did Ghaul always dream of a republic? What terrible worm burrowed into his heart that he would betray my love and plot against me?
My first act as emperor was to send the Consul into the wasteland. The golden sun would burn away his corrupt form—a fitting symbol for the revolution that was to be my reign.
I am the perfect loving god, and all will tremble to know me.
At the edge of the universe, I stared into the infinite deep. It stared back, and was pleased. I would become the herald of its victory, and bear witness for all creation.
What once was old shall be new again, and history will have its revenge.
“The Sindu inhabited gas giants in the spinward marches. They refused my invitation at first. As with all things, they came to see things my way.” —Emperor Calus
“The Sindu fly like surgeons operate. And the Ace-Defiants are the best among them. Only one Shadowed me.” —Emperor Calus
“The Ace-Defiant burned his mind to fly my golden ship. Being a Loyalist costs you. Being a Shadow costs dearly.” —Emperor Calus
“We armed the Sindu with a fleet of golden ships. Their interceptors are a shield for the Leviathan, as the Shadows are my sword.” —Emperor Calus
“With the death of the Ace-Defiant, the Leviathan is without a master helmsman. If I must wait another millennium for a replacement, I shall.” —Emperor Calus
The next time we meet.
You left me with nothing, but now I have everything.
You don't realize that I'm all around you.
You're a difficult one to find.
My gift to the Hunter with Ghaul's cunning.
“My planet was dead. The sky poisoned by war with an extrasolar enemy in a war that continued to rage. Then Calus came.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse
“Calus had won. But he took nothing from us. Instead he gave us everything we needed to end our perpetual war.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.
“Calus invited the Clipse to join his Loyalists. We refused, at first. So he sent a Shadow.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.
“Valus Nohr marched on our capital with a few thousand. For weeks we battered them. But the Valus. She broke us.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.
“Calus could not heal our air. My planet is still dying. But as long as I serve, I have hope.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.
Looking for a quiet place to watch the end of the world.
I will be the last light to go out at the party.
What will we be to each other in the next life?
The chorus of regret must be deafening.
A gift for the Titan with Ghaul's strength.
“How does one convince a creature of pure, sentient energy to pledge her loyalty? The agency to leave home is intoxicating for anyone.” — Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
“Before my Councilors and I could finalize her containment armor, the very presence of the Fulminator assaulted the senses. She was breathtaking.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
“The Councilors devised a way for the Fulminator to escape her interstellar ark, to the outrage of her people.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
“What was she? A creature of the Light? Or the other end of the spectrum? The Councilors never finished their analysis.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
Are you just a phantom in a mirror?
There is nothing I cannot forgive.
Repentance has its rewards.
It's all for the sake of appearances.
For the Warlock possessed of Ghaul's wisdom.
“Vex technology on Mercury. Energy on Mars. This system is rich in spoils if one knows where to look.” —Val Ca'uor
The son's ambition will be his undoing.
"Earth has no Shadow. Not yet." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"When the end comes, I reserve the right to be last." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"You have truly grown fat from strength. And you are still as nimble as ever. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"Ace pilots. Assassination squads. Swift thieves in the night. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"A little faster. A little more lethal. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"There has only been a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.
"This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. They should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"I can solve this. Give me a weapon." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer at the Battle of Kaga-Clipse
"There's something very settling about sleeping atop a pile of my own spent rounds." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer
"The Loyalists won't be ready until every world in this system casts a Shadow. Calus will get us there." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer
"The Clipse worship guns. That's why Rull and I have an understanding. Even if he's not bright." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer
"I can outshoot anybody. Even the Traveler-spawn. My mind's bigger, too." —Feltroc, the Skull-Piercer
"You have truly grown fat from strength. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"Leaders. Elite infantry. Martial teachers. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
A little stronger. A more powerful stance. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.
"This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"I'm a Valus before I'm a 'Shadow.' But Calus is the empire's last, best hope. His plan is my plan." —Valus Nohr
"Do I miss my arm? I miss my empire. I would give everything to have it back. And I will." —Valus Nohr
"Rull threatens, but he'll fall in line. The Clipse just don't like to lose." —Valus Nohr
"Under Calus, this system will unite. And when the end comes, we'll be ready. All of us." —Valus Nohr
"What Calus found at the black edge… when he brings it to light, there will be a reckoning unlike anything this galaxy has ever seen." —Valus Nohr
"You have truly grown fat from strength. And you are still as wise as ever. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"Warrior-scholars. Reality breakers. Weapons of mass destruction. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
A little bolder. A little more focus. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.
"This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
"Five Lights. Too many to fight. I loosed web grenades and fled." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
"My stealth skin kept me secret. I just watched. To my dismay, the dead Light stood up. Shook himself off." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
"There was a sixth Light. He cut me and I cut him, but I had more arms. He fell in pieces." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
"The fiercest Light emerged from the tangle of the web grenade. The amethyst divider on his helmet gleamed with rage. I was gone by then. I'm no fool." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
"I never forgot what I saw—the gift the Great Machine could bestow. And Calus promised me more." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks

Crimson
Sweet Business
Sweet Business

Rat King
Rat King
Vigilance Wing
Sturm

Riskrunner

Skyburner's Oath

The Colony

Wardcliff Coil
Merciless
The Prospector
Fighting Lion
Telesto
Legend of Acrius
Legend of Acrius
D.A.R.C.I.
Tractor Cannon
"Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira
"Due respect, Commander? I was there when the Hive found us on Earth. I was there when we stopped them on Titan. And I'll be there when we wipe them out." —Sloane
"My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir
Since the Collapse, these pistols have been retooled several times to boost their firepower. A worn inscription reads, "To Victor, from Sigrun."
Select application: Flare gun. Water purifier. Interplanetary Positioning System. Encyclopædia Arcana. Personal flotation device. List continues.
Do not enter my realm and expect to leave unscathed.
